maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Henry
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Henry

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: You are q-q-quite persistent!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Vous êtes a-a-assez persistante !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Sir, I have already alerted the staff of CrossWorlds.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Sir, j'ai déjà prévenu le personnel de CrossWorlds.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: There is absolutely no way out for you.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Vous n'avez absolument aucun moyen de vous en sortir.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I'm also aware that you are in fact not a player but an actual person!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Je suis aussi au courant que vous n'êtes pas un joueur, mais une véritable personne !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: How?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Comment ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Oh? I-Is that s-so?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Oh ? E-Est-ce bien v-vrai ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Quite so I'm afraid. How you managed to stay hidden, however, is still a mystery to me.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Je crains que ça le soit. Comment vous avez réussi à rester caché, par contre, est encore un mystère pour moi.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Well... C-C-Could an actual human do t-t-this?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Bon... E-E-Est-ce qu'un véritable humain p-peut faire ça ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Baxton
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Baxton

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: What are you doing, I can't move!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Que faites-vous, je ne peux plus bouger !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Henry
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Henry

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: He won't be b-b-bothering us anymore, hehe.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Il ne va plus m-m-m'embêter plus longtemps, héhé.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Why!?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Pourquoi ?!

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Now you...
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Maintenant, toi...

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I can't seem to just d-delete you...
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Je n'arrive pas à juste te supprimer...

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: But...
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Mais...

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Henry
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Henry

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I can t-trap you and let my little f-f-friends take care of you!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Je peux te mettre dans mon piège et laisser mes petits a-a-amis s'occuper de toi !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Either you get t-tired or log-off.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Ou bien vous deviendrez fatigués ou bien vous vous déconnecterez.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: There he is!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Le voilà !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: He seems to be just... waiting?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Il a l'air... d'attendre quelque chose ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Let us put an end to this mockery, Lady Lea.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Allons mettre un terme à cette moquerie, Mademoiselle Lea.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: A rather gloomy hideout.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: C'est une cachette bien sombre.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I was unaware this cave was playable.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Je n'étais pas au courant que cette cave était jouable.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Baxton
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Baxton

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Good job, Lady Lea!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Bon travail, Mademoiselle Lea !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Hi?!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Salut ?!

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: You successfully completed the quest line created by the \c[3]IHSO\c[0] in celebration of the \c[3]2205th International Hackspace Convention\c[0].
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Vous avez réussi avec succès la série de quêtes crée par l'\c[3]OIHS\c[0] en célébration de la \c[3]2205ième Convention Internationale des Hackerspaces\c[0].

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: ...How?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: ... Comment ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: The whole quest line you have just completed was created by participants of this event.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: La série de quêtes que vous venez de terminer a été entièrement créée par des participants de cet évènement.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: The goal was to create a scenario that was so convincing that players would believe it.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Le but était de créer un scénario qui serait si convainquant que les joueurs le prendraient au sérieux.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I'm but a tiny fraction of it. My makers wish to congratulate you on coming this far!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Je ne suis qu'une petite fraction de cela. Mes créateurs vous félicitent d'avoir réussi d'être allé aussi loin !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: We hope you enjoyed the quest line!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Nous espérons que vous avez appréciée cette série de quêtes.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: As a reward we offer \c[3]extra CP\c[0] for you to spend!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Comme récompense, nous vous offrons un \c[3]CP supplémentaire\c[0] à dépenser !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Thank you for playing and good luck in future adventures!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Merci d'avoir joué et bonne chance pour vos futures aventures !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: You did it, Lea!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Tu as réussi, Lea !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: So, how did you like the quest?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Donc, est-ce que la quête t'a plu ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: ...Why?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Huh? You mean, why did I not just tell you?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Hein ? Tu veux dire, pourquoi je ne te l'ai pas dit ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Well, to be honest I did not know at first myself.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Bien, pour être honnête, au début je n'en savais rien.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I was really concerned that we had a hacker in the game.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: J'étais vraiment inquiet qu'on ait un pirate dans le jeu.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: But when I went ahead and checked I immediately saw that Henry was actually just an NPC.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Mais quand j'ai été plus loin et que j'ai vérifié, j'ai immédiatement vu que Henry était juste un PNJ.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: The \c[3]IHSO\c[0] is an organization dedicated to finding exploits in all kinds of systems.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: L'\c[3]OIHS\c[0] est une organisation dédiée à trouver des exploits dans tous genres de systèmes.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: They helped Instatainment to fix some bugs in the early days of CrossWorlds.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Ils ont aidé Instatainment à corriger des bugs lorsque CrossWorlds n'en était qu'à ses débuts.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I guess that is why they let them have this much fun.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: J'imagine que c'est pour cela qu'ils les ont laissés autant s'amuser.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Normally the company is pretty strict about these things.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: D'habitude la société est assez stricte sur ces choses-là.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Anyway, I did not want to spoil the surprise so I thought I would help keep up the suspense.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: En tout cas, je ne voulais pas gâcher la surprise donc j'ai pensé que je garderais le suspense entier.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Lea?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Lea ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: But all is well that ends well, right Lea?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Mais tout est bien qui se finit bien, Lea ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Have some more s-s-spiders!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Tiens, encore des a-a-araignées pour toi !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Let's s-s-see you you deal with these!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Voyons v-v-voir comment tu t'en sors a-a-avec eux !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: You can't k-k-keep up forever!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Tu p-p-pourras pas t'en sortir éternellement !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: C-come my darlings!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: A-Aller, mes chéris !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Aren't b-bugs the b-b-best?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Est-ce que les s-scarabées ne sont pas les plus f-f-forts ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Aren't spiders b-beautiful?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Est-ce que les araignées ne sont pas m-magnifiques ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: T-this will never end, hehe!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Ç-Ça ne s'arrêtera jamais, héhé !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: R-Ready for more?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: T-Tu en veux encore plus ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: W-What are you doing?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Q-Qu'est-ce que tu fais ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: S-stop it!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: A-Arrête !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Henry
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Henry

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: ENOUGH!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: ASSEZ !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: M-my probe is n-n-not yours.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: M-Ma sonde n-n-n'est pas à toi.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I'll just change its party s-s-settings so you c-can't attack, hehe!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Je vais juste changer ses p-p-paramètres de groupe pour que tu p-puisses pas l'attaquer, héhé !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Changing party...
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Changement de Groupe...

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: W-W-hat?!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Q-Q-Quoi ?!

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Now is your chance, Lea!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: C'est le moment, Lea !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I s-s-said STOP it!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: J'ai d-d-dit ARRÊTE !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Read Text
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Lire le Texte

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig:
This probe stands here in commemoration of the 
\c[3]2205th International Hackspace Convention\c[0]
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text:
Cette sonde est ici en commémoration de la 
\c[3]2205ième Convention Internationale des Hackerspaces\c[0]

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Its participants created a quest line for \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0] in order to fool its player base into believing a hacker has infiltrated the game.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Ses participants ont créé une lignée de quêtes pour \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0] pour duper ses joueurs pour leur faire croire qu'un pirate a infiltré le jeu.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Baxton
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Baxton

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Good job, Lady Lea!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Bon travail, Mademoiselle Lea !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: You successfully completed the quest line created by the \c[3]IHSO\c[0] in celebration of the \c[3]2205th International Hackspace Convention\c[0].
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Vous avez réussi avec succès la série de quêtes créée par l'\c[3]OIHS\c[0] en célébration de la \c[3]2205ième Convention Internationale des Hackerspaces\c[0].

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Thanks!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Merci !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: The whole quest line you have just completed was created by participants of this event.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: La série de quêtes que vous venez de terminer a été entièrement créée par des participants de cet évènement.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: The goal was to create a scenario that was so convincing that players would believe it.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Le but était de créer un scénario qui serait si convainquant que les joueurs le prendraient au sérieux.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I'm but a tiny fraction of it. My makers wish to congratulate you on coming this far!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Je ne suis qu'une petite fraction de cela. Mes créateurs vous félicitent d'avoir réussi d'être allé aussi loin !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: We hoped you enjoyed the quest line!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Nous espérons que vous avez appréciée la série de quête !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: As a reward we offer \c[3]extra Circuit Points\c[0] for your to spend!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Comme récompense, nous vous offrons un \c[3]CP supplémentaire\c[0] à dépenser !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Thank you for playing and good luck in future adventures!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Merci d'avoir joué et bonne chance pour vos futures aventures !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Teleport Outside
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Se Téléporter Dehors

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Code Knight
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Code Knight

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Hi?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Salut ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: That quest was...\. interesting.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Cette quête était...\. intéressante.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: I wasn't aware that the IHSO has been messing with CrossWorlds in the past.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Je n'étais pas au courant que l'OIHS avait mis son doigt dans le jeu dans le passé.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: What about you, ever tried tampering with their systems?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Et pour toi, est-ce que tu as déjà essayée de t'introduire dans leurs systèmes ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: [shakes head]
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: [secoue la tête]

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Heh.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Eh.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: With the right amount of patience it's doable.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Tout est une question de patience.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: There's a huge system behind CrossWorlds, but overall it's pretty standard for the most part.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Il y a un système immense derrière CrossWorlds, mais en général c'est la plupart du temps assez standard.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Yet finding those little loopholes is what makes it so interesting.
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Mais trouver ces petits tours de passe-passe, c'est ça qui est si intéressant.

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: That's what hacking is all about.\. Creating fun out of boring systems!
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: C'est ça le hacking.\. Tu t'amuses en cherchant dans un système ennuyeux !

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Bye?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Bye ?

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Creating fun...? I suppose that is one reason why you would do it...
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: S'amuser... ? J'imagine que c'est une motivation possible pour faire ça...

maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..orig: Wait a moment...\. isn't this room supposed to be instanced?
maps/forest/caves/cave-09-henry-hideout..text: Attends un moment....\. Cette salle n'était pas censée être instanciée ?

maps/forest/caves/path-06-chasm.json/ent.orig: Lea, this is the easternmost cave!
maps/forest/caves/path-06-chasm.json/ent.text: Lea, c'est la cave la plus à l'est !

maps/forest/caves/path-06-chasm.json/ent.orig: Henry must have come through this place.
maps/forest/caves/path-06-chasm.json/ent.text: Henry a forcément dû passer par ici.
